title: 旧约 - 箴言(Proverbs) - 第 18 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 箴言(Proverbs) -- 第 18 章 ( 本篇共有 31 章 )

lineList.en: Through desire a man, having separated himself, seeketh and intermeddleth with all wisdom.
lineList.cn: 与众寡合的，独自寻求心愿，并恼恨一切真智慧。

lineList.en: A fool hath no delight in understanding, but that his heart may discover itself.
lineList.cn: 愚昧人不喜爱明哲，只喜爱显露心意。

lineList.en: When the wicked cometh, then cometh also contempt, and with ignominy reproach.
lineList.cn: 恶人来，藐视随来。羞耻到，辱骂同到。

lineList.en: The words of a man's mouth are as deep waters, and the wellspring of wisdom as a flowing brook.
lineList.cn: 人口中的言语，如同深水。智慧的泉源，好像涌流的河水。

lineList.en: It is not good to accept the person of the wicked, to overthrow the righteous in judgment.
lineList.cn: 瞻徇恶人的情面，偏断义人的案件，都为不善。

lineList.en: A fool's lips enter into contention, and his mouth calleth for strokes.
lineList.cn: 愚昧人张嘴启争端，开口招鞭打。

lineList.en: A fool's mouth is his destruction, and his lips are the snare of his soul.
lineList.cn: 愚昧人的口，自取败坏。他的嘴，是他生命的网罗。

lineList.en: The words of a talebearer are as wounds, and they go down into the innermost parts of the belly.
lineList.cn: 传舌人的言语，如同美食，深入人的心腹。

lineList.en: He also that is slothful in his work is brother to him that is a great waster.
lineList.cn: 作工懈怠的，与浪费人为弟兄。

lineList.en: The name of the LORD is a strong tower: the righteous runneth into it, and is safe.
lineList.cn: 耶和华的名，是坚固台。义人奔入，便得安稳。

lineList.en: The rich man's wealth is his strong city, and as an high wall in his own conceit.
lineList.cn: 富足人的财物，是他的坚城，在他心想，犹如高墙。

lineList.en: Before destruction the heart of man is haughty, and before honour is humility.
lineList.cn: 败坏之先，人心骄傲。尊荣以前，必有谦卑。

lineList.en: He that answereth a matter before he heareth it, it is folly and shame unto him.
lineList.cn: 未曾听完先回答的，便是他的愚昧，和羞辱。

lineList.en: The spirit of a man will sustain his infirmity; but a wounded spirit who can bear?
lineList.cn: 人有疾病，心能忍耐。心灵忧伤，谁能承当呢。

lineList.en: The heart of the prudent getteth knowledge; and the ear of the wise seeketh knowledge.
lineList.cn: 聪明人的心得知识。智慧人的耳求知识。

lineList.en: A man's gift maketh room for him, and bringeth him before great men.
lineList.cn: 人的礼物，为他开路，引他到高位的人面前。

lineList.en: He that is first in his own cause seemeth just; but his neighbour cometh and searcheth him.
lineList.cn: 先诉情由的，似乎有理。但邻舍来到，就察出实情。

lineList.en: The lot causeth contentions to cease, and parteth between the mighty.
lineList.cn: 掣签能止息争竞，也能解散强胜的人。

lineList.en: A brother offended is harder to be won than a strong city: and their contentions are like the bars of a castle.
lineList.cn: 弟兄结怨，劝他和好，比取坚固城还难。这样的争竞，如同坚寨的门闩。

lineList.en: A man's belly shall be satisfied with the fruit of his mouth; and with the increase of his lips shall he be filled.
lineList.cn: 人口中所结的果子，必充满肚腹。他嘴所出的，必使他饱足。

lineList.en: Death and life are in the power of the tongue: and they that love it shall eat the fruit thereof.
lineList.cn: 生死在舌头的权下。喜爱他的，必吃他所结的果子。

lineList.en: Whoso findeth a wife findeth a good thing, and obtaineth favour of the LORD.
lineList.cn: 得着贤妻的，是得着好处，也是蒙了耶和华的恩惠。

lineList.en: The poor useth intreaties; but the rich answereth roughly.
lineList.cn: 贫穷人说哀求的话。富足人用威吓的话回答。

lineList.en: A man that hath friends must shew himself friendly: and there is a friend that sticketh closer than a brother.
lineList.cn: 滥交朋友的，自取败坏。但有一朋友，比弟兄更亲密。
